title: Asin
summary: Asin Thottumkal (born 26 October 1985), known mononymously as Asin, is a former Indian actress who appeared in Tamil, Hindi, and Telugu films. She is a trained Bharatanatyam dancer.[1] She has received three Filmfare Awards. She began her acting career in the South Indian film industry, but later shifted her focus to Bollywood.[2] She speaks eight languages,[3] and dubs her own films.[4][5] She is the only Malayali actress, other than Padmini, to have dubbed in her own voice for all her films, irrespective of language.[5] Asin has been referred to as the "Queen of Kollywood" by online portals in 2007.[6][7]
